languages.text: "Вера способна творить чудеса и исцелять безнадежно больных — этого отрицать нельзя".
"Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."
languages.original_text: "Вера способна творить чудеса и исцелять безнадежно больных — этого отрицать нельзя".

traits.locale_text: "Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."
"Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."
"Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."
"Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."
"Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."
"Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."
"Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."

languages.text: "Glaube kann Wunder wirken und selbst jene heilen, die als unheilbar gelten. Das lässt sich nicht bestreiten."
languages.original_text: "Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: "Glaube kann Wunder wirken und selbst jene heilen, die als unheilbar gelten. Das lässt sich nicht bestreiten."

languages.text: « La foi peut faire des miracles et guérir ceux que l'on pensait condamnés, c'est indéniable. »
languages.original_text: "Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: « La foi peut faire des miracles et guérir ceux que l'on pensait condamnés, c'est indéniable. »

languages.text: «La fe puede obrar milagros y curar a quienes están más allá de todo tratamiento. Eso es innegable».
languages.original_text: "Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: «La fe puede obrar milagros y curar a quienes están más allá de todo tratamiento. Eso es innegable».

languages.text: 「信仰は奇跡を起こし、手の施しようがない者を治すことができる。このことは否定できない」
languages.original_text: "Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: 「信仰は奇跡を起こし、手の施しようがない者を治すことができる。このことは否定できない」

languages.text: “信仰可以创造奇迹，治愈那些无法治疗的人。这一点不能否认。”
languages.original_text: "Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: “信仰可以创造奇迹，治愈那些无法治疗的人。这一点不能否认。”

languages.text: "İnanç, mucizeler yaratabilir ve iyileşmesi mümkün olmayanları iyileştirebilir. Bu inkâr edilemez."
languages.original_text: "Faith can work miracles and cure those who are beyond treatment. This cannot be denied."
